src:
4 Hero Ini Disebut Nggak Guna di Mobile Legends Season 14, Setuju?
05 Nov 2019, 08:15 by Mansur
4 Hero Kurang Worth It di Mobile Legends Season 14
Oketekno – Walaupun sudah mulai bermunculan pesaing game Mobile, akan tetapi tingkat popularitas game Mobile Legends sampai sekarang ini masih luar biasa. Permainan MOBA tersebut terus menawarkan sederet pembaruan dalam game, dan menghadirkan beberapa hero baru untuk menambah keseruan permainan.
Saat ini telah memasuki Season 14, dan akan segera berganti season lagi sehingga pemain harus mempersiapkan kuota yang cukup besar untuk update Mobile Legends. Namun sebelum itu, kali ini akan dibahas tentang beberapa hero yang dirasa nggak guna banget di season ini.

Simak Nih: 

Tips Bermain Mobile Legends Agar Tidak Gampang Tercyduk Musuh


Jelas saja ada berbagai macam alasan yang logika, mulai dari kehadiran hero baru, hingga memang kurang worth it lagi untuk melawan sederet hero baru yang kini OP OP banget. Penasaran apa saja hero tersebut? Berikut daftarnya.


Balmond




Copyright ©Oketekno

Sudah berbeda banget dari season sebelumnya yang masih cukup sering dipakai, tapi sekarang Balmond seolah tidak ada aromanya lagi. Pemicunya yakni Balmond tidak memiliki kemampuan spesial, entah itu damage sakit atau tank yang tebal. Kemudian sudah ada hero dengan kemampuan tanggung dengan pergerakan lebih cepat, yakni Baxia. Dengan demikian, Balmond menjadi kurang worth it lagi sekarang.

Baca Juga: Cara Menggunakan Balmond, Tank dengan Geprekan yang Mematikan



Argus




Copyright©Liputan6

Dulu memang ngeri parah hero ini, dikarenakan memiliki kemampuan immortality. Akan tetapi sekarang sudah tidak ada lagi kata spesial dari hero tersebut, terlebih sudah ada faramis yang menggantikan kekuatan Ultimate Argus, bahkan bisa menghidupkan seluruh team selama dalam jangkauan.

Baca Juga: 5 Hero yang Bisa Menjadi Tandingannya Aldous di Mobile Legends



Karina




Copyright ©Oketekno

Setingkat assassin Mage, popularitas Karina sekarang kalah jauh dengan Gusion yang punya pergerakan lebih lincah dan mematikan pastinya. Walaupun ultimate karina ngeri parah, namun secara fleksibilitas masih mantap Gusion yang punya skill dash dan juga regular damage cukup tinggi.

Baca Juga: 

Cara Menggunakan Karina, Si Penyelinap yang Mematikan




Hilda




Copyright ©Teknosaurus

Terakhir ada Hilda yang menjadi hero nggak guna dalam game Mobile Legends Season 14 ini. Kemampuan regen HP di semaknya kini sudah tidak efektif lagi, sebab damage tinggi dari musuh tidak memungkinkan Hilda dapat masuk dengan selamat ke semak-semak. Selain itu, Hilda juga low banget damage yang dimilikinya, serta tidak punya defense yang tebal banget seperti Grock.
Itulah keempat hero Mobile Legends yang dirasa sudah nggak guna lagi di Season 14 ini, dan mungkin berlanjut ke season berikutnya hingga sebelum mendapatkan buff atau revamp parah, tidak bisa meningkat lagi popularitasnya.
baca juga: Cara Menggunakan Hilda, Si Cepat dan Tangguh
text:
4 This Hero Is Called No Use in Mobile Legends Season 14, Agree?
05 Nov 2019, 08:15 by Mansur
4 Heroes Less Worth It in Mobile Legends Season 14
Oketekno - Although competing mobile games have begun to emerge, the popularity of the Mobile Legends game is still extraordinary. The MOBA game continues to offer a series of updates in the game, and presents several new heroes to add to the excitement of the game.
When this season has entered Season 14, and will change season soon so players must prepare a large enough quota for the Mobile Legends update. But before that, this time it will be discussed about some of the heroes that are considered very useless this season.

Listen Here:

Tips for Playing Mobile Legends So It Is Not Easily Shaken by Enemies


Obviously there are a variety of logical reasons, ranging from the presence of new heroes, to the fact that it is no longer worth it anymore to fight a series of new heroes who are now OP. Curious what these heroes? Here is the list.


Balmond




Copyright © Oketekno

It's very different from the previous season which is still quite often used, but now Balmond seems to have no more aroma. The trigger is that Balmond does not have special abilities, whether it's pain damage or a thick tank. Then there is already a hero with the ability to bear with faster movements, namely Baxia. As such, Balmond is no longer worth it now.

Also Read: How to Use Balmonds, Tanks with Deadly Shakes



Argus




Copyright © Coverage6

It used to be a terrible horror of this hero, due to his immortality. But now there are no more special words from the hero, especially there is Faramis who replaced the power of Ultimate Argus, even able to revive the entire team while in range.

Also Read: 5 Heroes Who Can Be Aldous's Match in Mobile Legends



Karina




Copyright © Oketekno

A level of assassin Mage, Karina's popularity is now far behind that of Gusion who has more agile and deadly movements for sure. Even though the ultimate karina was horrified, but in flexibility it was still solid Gusion which had dash skills and also regular damage was quite high.

Also Read:

How to use Karina, the deadly sneak




Hilda




Copyright © Teknosaurus

Finally there is Hilda who is a useless hero in this Mobile Legends Season 14 game. The ability to regenerate HP in the bush is no longer effective, because high damage from the enemy does not allow Hilda to enter safely into the bush. In addition, Hilda is also very low damage he has, and does not have a very thick defense like Grock.
Those are the four Mobile Legends heroes that are deemed useless in this Season 14, and maybe continue to the next season until before getting a buff or severe revamp, its popularity can no longer increase.
Also read: How to Use Hilda, Si Fast and Tough
